All Single Character Passwords
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Shrine (Passwords and Unlocking): All Single Character Passwords
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, November 19, 2002 - 07:40 pm:

Typing just one letter/number/character in the shrine makes pure-breed monsters with baseline stats.
